cfbfastR

The goal of cfbfastR is to provide the community with an R package for working with CFB data. It is an R API wrapper around https://collegefootballdata.com/.

Installation

You can install the released version of cfbfastR from GitHub with:

# Then can install using the devtools package from the following:

devtools::install_github(repo = "saiemgilani/cfbfastR")
